channel.title: The Tim Knox Show
channel.description: "The Tim Knox Show: Common Sense Business Advice With A Side Order of Fun" airs every Saturday afternoon from 12 noon to 2pm CST on News-Talk WVNN 770AM and 92.5FM. The show is broadcast live on the radio across the North Alabama/ Tennessee Valley listening area and as streaming audio for Internet users. To access Tim's archives visit http://www.timknoxshow.com.
channel.itunes:subtitle: Common Sense Business Advice With A Side Order of Fun!
channel.itunes:author: Tim Knox

To access Tim's archives visit http://www.timknoxshow.com.

item.title: 11/21/07 Hour 1 - The Tim Knox Radio Show On WVNN
item.description: The Tim Knox Show airs Monday through Friday on WVNN 770AM and 92.5FM, from 5pm - 7pm CT. Listeners can participate in the show by calling toll free 1-877-TIM-SHOW or emailing tim@wvnn.com. Visit http://www.timknoxshow.com for more information. This podcast features hour 1 of the Nov. 21, 2007 show.

item.title: 8/25/07 Hour 1 - The Tim Knox Radio Show Instant Replay
item.description: This is the last Tim Knox Saturday show. Tim announces that he will be doing a daily show on WVNN starting Sept. 5. See timknox.com for details. "The Tim Knox Show" features common sense business advice with a side order of fun! The Tim Knox Show airs every Saturday on WVNN 770AM and 92.5FM, from 12 noon to 2pm CST. Listeners can participate in the show by calling toll free 1-877-TIM-SHOW or emailing radio@timknox.com. Visit http://www.timknoxshow.com for more information. This podcast features hour 1 of the August 25, 2007 show.
